title: Our Proud Harbor
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Come on, Ayumu-chan! Go ahead and eat~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay, thanks for the food! *Munch*.... Hnnn~! Delicious-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Isn’t it? A lot of the fish caught in fall are just about to lay their eggs, so they have a lot of fat in them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>This is the first time I’ve seen a sashimi boat this big. And it’s full of fish I never ate before. I’m sorry, even though they’re this delicious, I don’t really know the kind of fish they are….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha. I guess I’m lucky that you don’t know much about fish, Ayumu-chan! Let me explain them. We’re proud of our seafood, so I’d love to tell you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Then, what is this one….? Also, these ones over here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, you have good eyes! It’s called the Rosy Seabass, it’s a fall and winter fish. You cannot eat it raw unless it’s fresh. This one is a Caranginae, a Splendid Alfonsino, and a Barracuda.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Amazing~! Everything is delicious!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>We’ll also bring out some boiled fish after this, so leave some space in your stomach, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I-, it’s no good! *Munch*.... My hands won’t stop~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
